Author: MaryUsagi
Name: HUD Layout Helper
Punchline: Adds QoL features to the native HUD layout editor, like undo, redo, copy and paste.
Description: Allows you to use keyboard shortcuts in the HUD Layout Editor, like Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V to copy and paste the position of individual HUD elements, and Ctrl+Z and Ctrl+Y to undo and redo changes.
